TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Makazayazaya, title = Makazayazaya, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Makazayazaya} }

S.FORM: Makazayazaya Itiniay i Majia Cen no Pingtung ko Makazayazaya a niyaro', 86 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 261 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 256 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 5 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 92%, Rukai 1%, Tayal 1%, roma 3%.

Makazayazaya Itiniay i Majia Cen no Pingtong ko Makazayazaya a niyaro', 86 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 261 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 256 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 5 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 92%, Rokai 1%, Tayal 1%, roma 3%.
